name: actualizer
description: Watches configuration repositories and ensures that deployments match configuration

scripts.start-sk: SLEEP_TIME=100000 CUSTOMER_DOMAIN='local.io' REDIS_EMULATE=true LBWS_VERSION=debug DEBUG=actualizer:* GIT_API_URL=http://git-api.local.io CONFIGSTORE_URL=http://api.cluster.local node ./index.js
scripts.start-staging: SLEEP_TIME=100000 GATEWAY_VERSION=feat_proxy-routing-strip-d CUSTOMER_DOMAIN='staging.lunchbadger.io' LBWS_VERSION=debug LBSLS_version=debug DEBUG=actualizer:* GIT_API_URL=http://localhost:8080 CONFIGSTORE_URL=http://staging-api.lunchbadger.com node ./index.js

author: Roman Lisagor <roman@lunchbadger.com>
